Articles.Content: I just deployed my space station into Kerbin orbit and have begun processing some reports I do not have yet. (Polar orbit so EVA reports from above varying regions usually.) However, when I attempt to research a report in my lab, such as my 8 Mits EVA report, the lab processes it to 100% and I get the message "Not enough data storage in lab". After some clicking, I noticed that my lab displays 50/500 data. Is there something I'm doing wrong in order to research in my lab?
Give us a pic of this or a video maybe? It seems like something has gone wrong.

It's a visual glitch, nothing more. Your data was added as expected, that just comes up for no apparent reason.

Don't worry, it isn't broken and you'll get your science data.
